channel.title: Character file resets
channel.description: Character file gets reset randomly, ( not every log-in but everytime i run server ) It just deletes the existing account file and makes a brand-new blank account. Any help?

Character file gets reset randomly, ( not every log-in but everytime i run server )
It just deletes the existing account file and makes a brand-new blank account.
